body:
Hi Chris , Mostapha & all , 

Hope my message finds you well , thank you for your great efforts in updating LB & HB plugin:) .  I updated my LB& HB but have a problem with openstudio , HB can't recognize it . I downloaded the latest version of openstudio but it's not compatible with energyplus 8.4 . should I setup energyplus 8.5 ? or which version of openstudio should I setup ? as I tried many versions but didn't work .

Thank you in advance ,

Mona
